comment.body:
It may be of interest to read the following article which outlines potential strategy by China to deal with the "financial war" by the USA:
http://www.informationclearinghouse.info/46961.htm

Hi, I have corrected an error of not including images in the first publication of this chapter. Additionally, I will soon be publishing a related chapter (to be the first chapter of Book Two) which deals with risks in general and particular in relation to the up coming Segwit.
This post is important particularly to clarify the Segwit related controversy. Please seed.
